query:
UPDATE instance
             SET    network = ?, 
                    from_addr = ?,
                    to_addr = ?,
                    amount = ?,
                    fee = ?,
                    status = ?,
                    pegin_request_txid = ?,
                    pegin_request_height = ?,
                    pegin_prepare_txid = ?,
                    pegin_confirm_txid = ?,
                    pegin_cancel_txid = ?,
                    unsign_pegin_confirm_tx = ?,
                    committees_sigs = ?,
                    committees = ?,
                    pegin_data_txid = ?,
                    timeout = ?,
                    updated_at = ?
            WHERE instance_id = ?
